low_picture_resolution_description: Low resolution pictures will be loaded to minimize data usage.
normal_picture_resolution_description: Pictures will be loaded with full resolution.
help_description_1: This is a quiz game to help you check up on your anime/manga/games knowledge and hopefully help you find some new cool pics.
help_description_2: The quiz is generated from the top posts from Danbooru, so the game is unbiased and ever-changing.
help_description_3: You can try to guess the show name or character name on a random selection of popular posts...
help_description_4: ...or you can search your favorite show and play a quiz about its characters.
help_description_5: If you like any pic, you can download it or check out the original Danbooru post for more info about it.
error_danbooru: Failed to fetch data from Danbooru.
error_no_posts: Not enough posts of different characters from this source found.
search_no_matches_description: Only searching for danbooru copyright tags (anime, games...) to play a quiz on characters from them is currently supported.
exit_quiz_confirmation: Sure you want to quit Quiz?
exit_quiz_confirmation_description: Your progress in this quiz will be lost.
no_cheat_description: You can open the Danbooru post after you answer.
skip_confirmation: Sure you want to skip this image?
skip_confirmation_description: It will count as a wrong answer.
more_pics_confirmation_character: Want to see more images of this character?
more_pics_confirmation_source: Want to see more images of this source?
more_pics_not_found_character: No more images of this character found.
more_pics_not_found_source: No more images of this source found.
hint_confirmation: Want to spend points to reveal the answer?
hint_confirmation_description: It will count as a correct answer.
about_copyright: Copyright (c) 2021, From Zero  All Rights Reserved.
about_text: This app was originally a practice project to learn programming, so we would really be grateful if someone ends up enjoying it. Thanks to Google's Flutter team and to the whole community of Danbooru for making it possible. All images belong to their awesome authors.
